body_html: Oh, I think it's just a matter of having a function that writes the kernel with some boilerplate to a file, executes an extension build, and loads it, but I think it's really neat to be able to quickly iterate those from Python rather than having to do these externally.

body: Oh, I think it's just a matter of having a function that writes the kernel with some boilerplate to a file, executes an extension build, and loads it, but I think it's really neat to be able to quickly iterate those from Python rather than having to do these externally.
